details:
mips: Enable KCSAN - take 2

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.17.2 by commit 89e346c881522f3551de65d2a1d3f1b2c8648904, it was introduced in version v5.17.2 by commit 958b5990153934ba68436305f53f48ed87a1ae9a. For more details please see the references link.
